title: Web Onboarding OCBC
desc: A self-guided onboarding web application built with React and TypeScript, allowing customers to effortlessly apply for bank products on their own through their devices.

title: Terra Smart Tracker
desc: An Android app for a GPS-based tractor rental system using PHP for the backend and PhoneGap for the UI, integrating GPS to monitor usage, send service reminders, and ensure accurate cost calculation.

title: Movie Catalogue using NUXT
desc: Playground for experimenting with Vue and Nuxt. A chat feature using WebSocket was removed in production due to serverless hosting limits, but you can try it locally on the feat/chat-plugin branch.

title: Golang Rest API
desc: My personal project for building a Golang REST API, demonstrating practices in structuring a Go project, managing dependencies, handling APIs, and performing database migrations.
